entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 8:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
